preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 80 g of boron powder. 
 2. Measure 190 g of cobalt powder. 
 3. Measure 10 g of manganese powder. 
 4. Measure 80 g of terbium oxide. 
 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mechanical mixer to ensure thorough mixing for 15 minutes.
